data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Tokyo pushes forward through Hirotaka Mita, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 6, Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tokyo's half?
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Kawasaki Tokyo attack through Kensuke Nagai. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo just outside Kawasaki's area.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Kengo Nakamura. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 15, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo's Leandro is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kaoru Mitoma of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 24, Kawasaki have been given a penalty at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium...
Tsuyoshi Watanabe is booked for the away team.
It's advantage Kawasaki in Kawasaki as Akihiro Ienaga scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 28, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 29, Kawasaki's Akihiro Ienaga misses with an attempt on goal.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Kawasaki's Hidemasa Morita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Tokyo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Kawasaki.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 39, Kaoru Mitoma (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 43, Kawasaki are pushing forward but Leandro Damiao's finish is wide of the goal.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Kawasaki's Kyohei Noborizato gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Kawasaki drives forward and Akihiro Ienaga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Kengo Nakamura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Shogo Taniguchi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Hajime Matsuo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao is whistled for offside at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The away team have replaced Hirotaka Mita with Takumi Nakamura. This is the first substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
Kawasaki's Kyohei Noborizato breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 47, Hajime Matsuo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 50, Tokyo needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
The match at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Arthur Silva, who is down injured.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 52, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Arthur Silva returns to the field for Tokyo after picking up a slight injury.
Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 53, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Diego Oliveira grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Great play from Shuto Abe to set up the goal.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ao Tanaka for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 61, Tokyo drives forward and Diego Oliveira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 63, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 65, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tsuyoshi Watanabe is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Tokyo's Tsuyoshi Watanabe looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In Kawasaki, Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 73, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Kawasaki take a 2-1 lead thanks to Kengo Nakamura.
That's a fine assist from Kaoru Mitoma.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Diego Oliveira with Adailton.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's third substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Kyosuke Tagawa replacing Kensuke Nagai.
In the minute 77, Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a first substitution, with Yasuto Wakizaka replacing Kengo Nakamura.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kawasaki.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 81, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 83, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Tokyo's area.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 87, Tokyo pushes forward through Adailton, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kawasaki's Miki Yamane breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 89, Tokyo make their fourth substitution with Takuya Uchida replacing Hotaka Nakamura.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Kawasaki.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Tokyo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Tokyo's area.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tokyo's half?
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Taichi Hara is replacing Leandro for Tokyo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Shintaro Kurumaya is replacing Kyohei Noborizato for the home team.
Kazuya Yamamura is on a sub for Leandro Damiao for Kawasaki.
Manabu Saito is replacing Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
